entries.author: jdoe
entries.text: System startup completed successfully. All subsystems green.

entries.author: asmith
entries.text: Calibration run for detector array complete. Results within 2% of expected values.

entries.author: bwong
entries.text: Temperature spike in cooling loop 2. Increased flow rate to compensate.

entries.author: ckim
entries.text: Data acquisition system rebooted after software crash. All data recovered from buffer.

entries.author: dlee
entries.text: Shift handoff complete. All systems stable. No outstanding issues.
